feature_model.name: root
feature_model.feature_tree: :r root (root) :o F1 (F1) :o F5 (F5) :o F6 (F6) :o F8 (F8) :o F10 (F10) :o F3 (F3) :o F2 (F2) :o F7 (F7) :o F4 (F4) :o F9 (F9)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~F5 or F9 constraint_2:~F6 or F3 constraint_3:~F3 or F4 constraint_4:~F2 or F9 constraint_5:~F2 or F7 constraint_6:~F7 or F4 constraint_7:~F5 or ~F2 constraint_8:~F5 or ~F7 constraint_9:~F1 or ~F2 constraint_10:~F1 or ~F7 constraint_11:~F6 or ~F2 constraint_12:~F6 or ~F7 constraint_13:~F8 or ~F2 constraint_14:~F8 or ~F7
